footer.iAmNotARobot: I am not a robot – reveal contact

home.descriptionPT1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer passionate about creating robust applications that deliver seamless user experiences.
home.descriptionPT2: I enjoy tackling complex challenges through clean, maintainable code and focus on building scalable, reliable solutions across front-end, back-end, and database systems.
home.technologiesExplore: Interested in a deeper dive into the tools and technologies I work with?
home.projectsIntro: Here's a quick look at some projects I have worked on. For more,
home.projectsPortfolioLink: check out my full project portfolio.

cannabis.title: Cannabis Cultivation & Inventory
cannabis.description: A desktop application for monitoring cannabis plant health, managing cultivation processes, and tracking inventory across growth cycles.

tradeplanner.title: Trading Journal & Planner
tradeplanner.description: A desktop trading companion for logging trade details, planning strategies, writing notes, and visualizing performance analytics in a dashboard.

portfolio.title: Developer Portfolio
portfolio.description: A personal portfolio built with Next.js to showcase my projects, resume, and contact information in a responsive, user-friendly layout.

calculator.title: Smart Calculator
calculator.description: A desktop calculator inspired by the sleek design of the iOS calculator. It performs basic math operations with a clean and intuitive user interface.

home.locationDescription: I'm based in the Greater Montreal area. You can find me around here:
home.availability: I'm open to local, remote, and hybrid opportunities.

resume.pageDescription: Here's a quick look at my experience and education. You can also download or view the PDF version directly.
